data.text: @ViragoQueen17 @irlety36 I have been saying this since the beginning. What happened to the standards of Koch’s Postulates. The virus doesn’t exist and this is ONE LARGE LIE & ATTACK ON HUMANITY!!!

@ViragoQueen17 Virus isolation is described in those papers
& many others
It's unreasonable to dismiss such a large amount of evidence the virus has been isolated without any reason

At least you could explain why you imagine all those papers are wrong

#COVID19 #SARSCoV2
